slicingProfile.gCodeHeader:
G21 ;Set units to be mm
G91 ;Relative Positioning
G28 ; Home Printer
M650 D${ZLiftDist} S${ZLiftRate} P0; CWH Template Preferences
M17 ;Enable motors
;<Delay> 3000
M400
M106
slicingProfile.gCodeFooter:
M18 ;Disable Motors
M107 ;switch uv off
G1 Z40; Lift up
;<Completed>
slicingProfile.gCodeLift:
M400
M107
G1 Z${ZLiftDist} F100
G1 Z${(-ZLiftDist+LayerThickness)} F100 
;<Delay> 3000
M400
M106
